resources.string: Welcome to the onboarding template app!
You can also swipe backwards and forwards!
You can also change the amount of pages!
Here you can write a lot of lorem ipsum and whatever else you want to introduce the application to the user.
Here you can write EVEN MORE lorem ipsum and whatever else you want to introduce the application to the user (also check out the skip button).
Here you can write EXCEEDING AMOUNTS of lorem ipsum and whatever else you want to introduce the application to the user.
Here you can write ALL OF THE of lorem ipsum and whatever else you want to introduce the application to the user.
Feel free to use the source code of this application wherever you see fit.
Welcome to the Pre-Sign in screen!
Here you can log in via Google, create an account, or just sign in. Make sure to add your app credentials in Google Cloud! Signing in via Google skips log in and sign up.
Enter your user identifier and password.
You can change whether the user is prompted for an email or an username via navigation graph parameters.
You can change whether the user is prompted for an email or an username via navigation graph parameters.
You can change whether a password confirmation is needed via navigation graph parameters.
